    About Monte Mohr


    Monte has been in real estate for over 35 years. Throughout his career he has owned 4 real estate companies and has personally sold over 3,000 homes, not counting team production. He’s written a book titled Your Middle Tennessee Home Seller’s Guide, Secrets to Getting Top Dollar in Today’s Market and was a writer for the Tennessean for 2 years, where he published over 100 articles. He has been on NBC’s Chan 4 over 100 times answering local homeowners questions, and is currently the co-host of the weekly radio show on WTN’s SuperTalk 99-7 called “The Talk of Music City Real Estate.” Go give it a listen - you can find the podcast under that name on Facebook, Stitcher, iTunes, etc.!

    Monte has stepped away from being a top producing sales person since opening Realty ONE Group Music City to focus on becoming the guide for each of his agents and assisting them in growing their individual businesses.

    “This is my legacy. As their guide, our agents don’t have to go through what I did over the past 3 ½ decades. My heart’s desire is to equip each one to become their very best and to reach levels of success they had only dreamed of.” - Monte Mohr
